title: Stellar Diwali decor ideas on a budget
text:
SPLURGE BUDGET: Rs 1 LAKH





Rs.

Rs.

Rs.

Metal chairs Rs. 18,000,Asian chest12,000,Painting by G Jagdish80,000,Lotus candle stand14,000With the festive season around the corner, it's time to refurbish your house to kick off the celebrations! Give your pad a cheerful makeover by incorporating a few key changes to the decor. And the best part? You won’t burn a hole in your pocket trying to implement these ideas. Don’t stress if you are working within a budget since it is possible to make significant improvements within your means. According to Khushi Todi, interior designer and founder, Cane Boutique, “One of the best and easiest ways to spruce up your space on a low budget is by redoing the walls. You can paint them brighter or clad them with printed wall paper to add some drama. Other options include adding indoor plants, changing accessories, using loose furnishings like cushions and rugs.”
description: Jazz up your pad with these unique decor ideas and solutions for every budget. Go ahead, give your home the makeover it deserves.
